title: Did Texas Rule Kids Don’t Need to Be Schooled If They Believe in the Rapture?
subtitle: Texas did not declare that all children whose families believe the Rapture is imminent are exempt from schooling, nor did a family argue anything of the sort in a recent court case.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: School is no longer compulsory for Texas students whose parents believe in the religious concept of Rapture.
